TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ICanvas

Docs.summary: Represents a platform-agnostic canvas on which 2D graphics can be drawn using types from the namespace.

Starting y coordinate of the bounding box.
Horizontal alignment options to align the string within the bounding box.
Vertical alignment options to align the string within the bounding box.
